text:
Hi Team,

I am having some issues with JMeter recording proxy issues.
I am a Java Developer. I am performing JMeter load testing for 
application. 
I have developed one application in JSP with Struts which contains two 
pages.
The First page contains Login Page which contains fields like username & 
password with Submit button.
If i will enter the URL in IE ie., 
http://IPAdderess/ApplicationName/login.jsp  this page is recording. After 
entering username & password with submit button the navigation is going to 
second page but its not recorded by JMeter proxy server. Suppose if i 
click on Logout Link in Second page logout link is recording.

I perform any action on buttons JMeter is not performing recording. Please 
help me on this.

Do u i need to add any thing for Submit button recording.
Please do needful.
Eagerly Waiting for responses. My Work is Stuck :-(

--
Thanks & Regards,
Raghunatha Rao Ch
Cell:- +919986729072
creator: ch.raghunatharao@tcs.com
